name: Card Rush: Funny Sea Animal
description:
What are you looking for?
- A funny game for your kid
- A relax game for you in free time
- A game help your brain.
- A simple game for no thinking activities.

This is the game for you.
A fun card game for your family.
Come on and playing now.

Play this memory game and watch the kids happily settle down as they match the items.
You choose the same cards in this game and they will destroyed.

This is not only a game for fun. It will have you and your kids know more about sea animal and have a good time.

GUIDE: There is a highlight card. Get this game match and you can get a lot of Score.
Challenge Mode with 50 cards is waiting you achieve.
